snippet.title: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Official Story Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow to your Wishlist:
⏺️ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1685730/Cynthia_Hidden_in_the_Moonshadow/

-«  About the Game  »-
Emotional 3rd-person story-driven exploration game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environment elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

Take control of the young adept and learn new stealth skills during your journey. Find out what happened in the home village and follow your desired path to rescue the ones you love the most. Travel through Tesana valley to find and collect powerful pieces of artifact to enhance your bow. The dark magic is coming from the north, you need to destroy the source of that power before it's going to be too late. You are the last one that can reach desired destination. At least you need to try, for the loved ones!

-«  Follow my development process  »-
⏺️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/THdev_eu
⏺️ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thdev_eu/

-«  Music was made by Christopher Baklid  »-
⏺️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChrisBaklid
